casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Reginald Underwood FULLARD No. 309P15-5 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 14, 2018 Ms. Kimberly N. Callahan, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina Mr. Reginald Fullard, for Fullard, Reginald Mr. James R. O'Neill, District Attorney, for State

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 29th of May 2018 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the Superior Court, Forsyth County, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court of that County:

"Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2018."

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 29th of May 2018 by Defendant to Proceed In Forma Pauperis:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2018."

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 29th of May 2018 by Defendant to Appoint Counsel:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2018."
